Career Summary
5 years of experience in network protocols , IP planning and Communication
Network design.
In-depth Cisco technology knowledge in design, administration, 
implementation and support.

Dealing with escalating problems.
Efficient use of Microsoft VISIO as technical documentation and 
presentation tools.
Excellent experience in Network Planning, Implementing, Configuring, 
Troubleshooting and Testing of networking system.
